question: Which of the following are examples of the object-oriented interface in Matplotlib? (Select all that apply)

answers.feedback: plt.plot is part of the functional interface, not the OO interface.
Correct! ax.plot uses the Axes object's method, which is the core of the OO interface.
Correct! ax.set_xlabel is a method on the Axes object, demonstrating the OO approach.
plt.xlabel is part of the functional interface, as it operates on the current axes implicitly.
